text: Iti (Muhammad (SAW)): “Tinotenda muna Allah neizvo zvakadzikiswa kwatiri (Qur’aan), uye neizvo zvakadzikiswa kuna Abrahamu, Ishumaeri, Isaka, Jakobho pamwe nemaAl-Asbaat (vana vevana vaJakobho gumi nevaviri), neizvo zvakapihwa Musa, uye naIsa (Jesu) pamwe nemaporofita ese kubva kuna Tenzi vavo. Hatipatsanuri pakati pavo (maporofita), uye kwavari (Allah) takazvipira (semaMuslim).”
